catentdesc.name: Albini Black Canvas Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Which boy wouldn 't love black canvas shoes? The greatest of all sports shoes, these trainers are hardwearing and lasts a long time. The black and white combination gives an elegant look.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Brown Casual Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Appropriate for any casual occasion, these brown shoes will let your boy walk in style. With a felt upper and a printed checks layering inside, these shoes have matching shoe laces.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Denim Toddler Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Make other parents take a second look with these denim shoes for your toddler. With blue laces keeping the toddler feet snug, these shoes are a fashion statement on their little feet.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Blue Canvas Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: With a canvas upper and a vulcanised sole, these classic shoes are stylish and popular. Suitable for all seasons, wear these sneakers with a pair of jeans and a tee for a chic and trendy appearance.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Orange Baby Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: As bright as your baby boy and as sunny as his disposition is the color of these leather shoes for him. The velcro easy fasteners lets him wear his shoes all by himself. The firm rubber sole keeps him from falling while he is running around.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Formal Leather Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: These formal leather shoes in classic maroon makes a man out of your little boy. Stylish and chic, they are easy to slip on and have a soft insole for cushioning the feet.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Baby Canvas Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Start early with these baby canvas shoes in which your toddler learns to run and play. The cute little shoe laces are adorable in this tiny version. The red stripe around the base adds attractive color to the theme.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Baby Brown Leather Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Perfect for those naughty ones, these army green sneakers go well with nature and adventure when the little guy is exploring his surroundings. Made of suede and leather, these shoes provide good traction, fleece cushioning inside and velcro fasteners for easy put-on.
